name: Little Hope
description:
Controls
  • Move Left: A
  • Move Right: D
  • Jump: W
  • Attack: Mouse Left Click
  • Pull Object: Mouse Right Click (Hold)
How to Play
  • In order to complete a level, player need to connect Key Ball to Lock Platform
  • Portal location are hinted by Sign and distinct platform
  • Key Ball and Lava Ball can be pulled
  • Player only have one life
  • Player and turret can take damage
  • Lava Ball will enter Active State when it move and enter Deactive State when stand still. Active State can damage colliding player or turret.
Description

A free 2D Puzzle Platformer game utilizing free game assets from the community for the community.  This project was made to complete the grading requirements in the course game programming and software engineering. Made by Rasdy Prima Arief, Joseph Wilson, & Timothy Kenji.
